name: Salmon Dice Ball!
description:
A submission to GMTK Game Jam 2022.

Life came holding me back in full force for this one.

Played with the mouse.

*Edit after the upload

Looks like html5 don't like the texture buttons.

I'm planning to upload a build not using texture buttons after the Game Jam review period.

Used Audio and BGM

Cassette Tape Dream written by しゃろう

YOIYAMI-宵闇- written by Keyta

https://opengameart.org/content/knife-sharpening-slice-1

https://opengameart.org/content/total-fail

Used Art Assets:

https://opengameart.org/content/slates-32x32px-orthogonal-tileset-by-ivan-voirol
